snippet.title: The First Berserker: Khazan - Release Date Trailer | PS5 Games
snippet.description:
The First Berserker: Khazan launches March 27, 2025, on PlayStation. Watch the Russo Brothers-supervised hardcore action trailer now ⚔

PRE-ORDER NOW: https://store.playstation.com/en-us/concept/10009937/

The First Berserker: Khazan is a hardcore action RPG based on DNF (Dungeon & Fighter) Universe that will be available on PlayStation 5. As Khazan, the great general of the Pell Los Empire who overcame death, players will unveil the incidents that led to his downfall and seek vengeance on his enemies. The First Berserker: Khazan launches on March 27, 2025. Free demo available starting January 16!

#ps5 #ps5games #thefirstberserkerkhazan #thefirstberserkerkhazan #tga2024 

Rated Mature
